page_title: Who I Am | Raz Podestá - Digital Ecosystem Architect
page_description: Discover the fusion of two decades of elite software engineering with a creative, AI-driven vision, designed to build high-performance digital assets.
intro_subtitle: My name is Raz Podestá. And my purpose is to transform your vision into a high-performance digital asset.

act_i.title: Act I: The Engineer's Foundation
act_i.description: For over 20 years, my career was forged in the engine room of technology: backend systems architecture, data business, and data analysis. This foundation in systems engineering is not just my past; it is the guarantee that every project I build today is born on unbreakable foundations, designed for scale and resilience.

act_ii.title: Act II: The Strategic Shift
act_ii.description: I realized that the market didn't need more code, but holistic solutions that integrated technical excellence with a compelling brand strategy and user experience. This was my turning point: the decision to become independent to merge the rigor of an engineer with the vision of a creative architect.

act_iii.title: Act III: The Sovereign Arsenal
act_iii.description: To materialize this vision, I forged my own arsenal. 'LIA Legacy,' my sovereign AI co-pilot, not only radically accelerates development but acts as a strategic co-author in every solution. In parallel, my 'ES' methodology ensures a high-speed, high-clarity development lifecycle, which translates into a drastic reduction in technical debt for my clients.

act_iv.title: Act IV: The Digital Premise Philosophy
act_iv.description: My philosophy is simple: I don't build 'sites,' I build 'digital premises.' Every project begins with a robust architectural foundation (an Nx monorepo) prepared for unlimited growth. This means that when you invest in a solution with me, you're not buying a house; you're acquiring land that's ready for a skyscraper. Scalability isn't a future idea; it's the starting point.

act_v.title: Act V: The Growth Arsenal
act_v.description: Creativity and technology only make sense if they drive results. That's why my work spans the entire conversion spectrum: from designing marketing and sales funnels to creating high-quality content and developing Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) that dominate the mobile experience. I am a full-stack builder and a strategic partner in modernizing and evaluating technological projects.
